thread.title: Watch: Shocking video where woman abuses Muslims, calls them ISIS b | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Watch: Shocking video where woman abuses Muslims, calls them ISIS b | Deccan Chronicle

author: ANI
title: Watch: Shocking video where woman abuses Muslims, calls them ISIS b | Deccan Chronicle
text:
ANI | October 17, 2015, 21.27 pm IST Share Tweet Printer-friendly version Send by email Woman seen abusing Muslims in the video (Photo: YouTube screenshot) London: In a shocking video, a woman in a bus was seen abusing two Muslim passengers in London. According to the Guardian, the video, which was shot by a fellow passenger, shows the woman abusing two Muslim women. She repeatedly called the women "Isis b and told them to leave England and go back to their country. The video also shows the woman threatening to kick one of the Muslim women who was pregnant.
Transportation Police have started a probe on abuse after the video went viral on the social media. The incident comes days after the UK Government ordered police forces to gather data on Islamophobic attacks. islamophobia ISIS Muslim London World Also Read President Obama's China visit will be 'important milestone': White House Bid to revive Miss Iraq pageant draws ire of hardliners Egypt court begins retrial of Al-Jazeera journalists Britain reopens embassy in Tehran
